titles.title: Organic Standards Protection Act
To amend the Organic Foods Production Act of 1990 to require recordkeeping and authorize investigations and enforcement actions for violations of such Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Horticulture, Research, Biotechnology, and Foreign Agriculture.

committee.subcommittee: Horticulture, Research, Biotechnology, and Foreign Agriculture
committee.name: House Agriculture
